text:
The example for the "Satisfy" directive needs two additional lines to work 
properly:
Order Deny,Allow
Deny from All
Otherwise any request will be satisfied.
creator: kohaseloh@gmx.net

text:
Well, it could conceivable be right depending on parent-directory configuration.
But you are correct that it is not at all optimal.  It will be fixed in the
next release.

(I just added "Order allow,deny", which has the same effect as your
suggestion.)

Thanks.
creator: slive@apache.org
